summary: Silvernight armour is a dark retexture (metallic with white runes) of jojjo\'s fantastic Silverlight armour, for those that feel the original is too bright for a bringer of death.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Description[/b][/u]

Silvernight armour is a dark retexture (metallic with white runes) of jojjo\'s fantastic Silverlight armour, for those that feel the original is too bright for a bringer of death.

[u][b]Updates[/b][/u]

21st April 2012: Added Blood Red variant, for those that wish to use it instead of the default blue.

[u][b]Requirements[/b][/u]

It\'s important to note that this mod requires the original, which can be found [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10251]here[/url]

[u][b]Installation[/b][/u]

You all know the drill, simple enough. Should be compatible with NMM, too. Install *after* the original mod.

[u][b]Credits[/b][/u]

Credit to the original Silverlight armour goes to jojjo. Credit for the CBBE weight slider version of it (available on his download page) goes to me. I\'ve modified his textures (with permission) for this mod.

[u][b]Permissions[/b][/u]

No modification without permission - same applies to the original work.
author: Frozzled

files.name: Silvernight Armour with Blood Red Gems FIX
files.fileName: Silvernight Armour with Blood Red Gems FIX-15329-1-0-1.zip
